GapFillDragDrop.Title: have to, don’t have to, can and can’t
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Drag the phrases to the correct spaces.

Content.Question:
1. Does your sister have to wear a uniform? No, she doesn't.
2. Can Peter Dean leave work early today? Yes, he can.
3. Do we have to go through the park? Yes, you do.
4. Can my dog come in? No, it can't.
5. Can I leave my bicycle here? No, you can't.
6. Does your nephew have to work today? No, he doesn't.
7. Can Maria play tomorrow? Yes, she can.
8. Do passengers have to show their passports? Yes, they do.
